body:
Adds a package for the kitty terminal.

A few of the dependencies needed `setup_dependent_environment` implemented in order to be detected/used. For example, the `util-macros` package provides several m4 macros, which aren't discovered unless `ACLOCAL_PATH` is properly set.

One of kitty's dependencies, `libxkbcommon`, needed a few dependencies of its own added in order to compile.
title: new package: kitty terminal
